name: Ed_Hurley,_Sr.
text:
Ed Hurley, Sr.
Ed Hurley, Sr. was the father of Ernest, Ed, and Billy Hurley.
During the Depression, Hurley and his wife opened a roadside stand outside of Twin Peaks, where they sold food from the family farm. Following World War II, Hurley added gas pumps to the stand, which was eventually renamed Ed's Gas Farm.
Hurley died in 1983.
